cast.name: 杰瑞米·加德奈 Jeremy Gardner
亚当·克隆海姆 Adam Cronheim

this_title: Tools of Ignorance: The Making of 'The Battery
introduction: A feature-length documentary about the making of the The Battery, an independent zombie film that has received worldwide acclaim, featuring filmmaker interviews, behind the scenes footage, and deleted scenes. Learn how the film came together from the filmmakers' early beginnings to the writing, casting, production, post-production, and release.
chinese_title: Tools of Ignorance: The Making of 'The Battery
